text.value: This app uses weather data from Open-Meteo and is intended for non-commercial purposes only. For commercial use, please visit their pricing page.
7-day GMT forecast comparison between Location 1 & Location 2

options.code:
/****************

####	Attribution and Usage Notice

This app utilizes weather data provided by Open-Meteo (https://open-meteo.com/). Please note that the usage of Open-Meteo's API for commercial purposes is not free.

####	Non-Commercial Use Only

This app is intended for non-commercial use only. If you intend to use this app for commercial purposes, please visit their pricing page (https://open-meteo.com/en/pricing) to select a plan and obtain your own API key.

Thank you for your understanding and compliance.

****************/
